1.title: Welcome to the Jungle
1.description: Welcome to your first quest! You are in a jungle. You see a tiger. What do you do? Farm carrots!

2.title: Carrot Conundrum at the Royal Feast
2.description: The princess has mysteriously disappeared! Cook up a feast that is sure to lure her back.

3.title: Farmer's Market Fiasco
3.description: The annual farmer's market is facing an unexpected shortage of carrots! Help them out by bringing some of your own.

4.title: Carrot Cartel Conspiracy
4.description: Rumor has it that the Carrot Cartel has set up in the jungle. They might be planning something big. Go investigate.
